abstract: A proposal to merge the boards of the city's five main public employee pension systems is aimed at lowering administrative costs and increasing annual returns.
snippet: A proposal to merge the boards of the city's five main public employee pension systems is aimed at lowering administrative costs and increasing annual returns.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and New York City Comptroller John C. Liu are set to announce on Thursday a sweeping overhaul of the city's five main public employee pension systems.

headline.main: Overhaul Planned for City's Largest Pension Systems
